trans-unit.target: Feeling Lucky<tab>Complete 3 dungeons via the Duty Roulette.
Dungeon Master<tab>Complete 5 dungeons.
You're the Hest Around I<tab>Complete 3 guildhests.
You're the Hest Around II<tab>Complete 10 guildhests.
Aqua Gleam Hunter Force I<tab>Open 5 treasure coffers in treasure dungeon vaults.
Tails of Derring-do Bad and Good Luck<tab>Complete and mark off 3 Wondrous Tails.
A Wolf in Your Belly<tab>Participate in 10 Crystalline Conflict matches.
Thrown to the Wolves<tab>Triumph in 3 Crystalline Conflict matches.
Just Leve It to Me<tab>Complete 5 levequests with different leve plates.
Making Like a Tree<tab>Complete 20 levequests.
Give 'Em What They Want II<tab>Complete 10 supply and provisioning missions.
Give 'Em What They Want I<tab>Complete 5 supply and provisioning missions.
X Marks the Spot<tab>Gather 3 timeworn maps.
Find Your Treasure and Have It Too<tab>Open 5 treasure coffers and obtain their contents while treasure hunting.
Bosom Buddies I<tab>Defeat 20 enemies of comparable level to your own with your companion.
Bosom Buddies II<tab>Defeat 100 enemies of comparable level to your own with your companion.
Improving Society Somewhat I<tab>Complete 5 allied society daily quests.
Improving Society Somewhat II<tab>Complete 15 allied society daily quests.
Up for a Challenge I<tab>Complete 5 unique challenges.
Up for a Challenge II<tab>Complete 10 unique challenges.
Up for a Challenge III<tab>Complete 15 unique challenges.
Up for a Challenge IV<tab>Complete 20 unique challenges.
Exercising the Right<tab>Vote 5 times in player commendation.
The Gathering Storm<tab>Successfully gather items of comparable level to your own 100 times.
A Boon from Nature<tab>Successfully trigger the Gatherer's Boon effect while gathering items of comparable level to your own 30 times.
Hooked on the Reeling<tab>Catch 30 fish.
Catch of the Day<tab>Catch 10 large-sized fish.
Crafting Up a Storm<tab>Craft 30 items.
Crafting Up a Storm (HQ)<tab>Craft 20 high-quality items.
Venture Capital<tab>Have a retainer complete 10 ventures.
Venture Bothers<tab>Have a retainer complete 15 exploration ventures.
Line Up<tab>Participate in 7 Frontline campaigns.
In the Line of Fire<tab>Lead your company to victory in 3 Frontline campaigns.
Size Doesn't Matter<tab>Complete 3 mini-games.
From Small Things<tab>Earn 100 MGP from mini-games.
Open the Gates<tab>Participate in 5 GATEs.
Close the Gates<tab>Successfully complete 3 GATEs.
To the Races I<tab>Enter 3 chocobo races.
To the Races II<tab>Enter 20 chocobo races.
Victory Lap I<tab>Win a chocobo race.
Victory Lap II<tab>Win 10 chocobo races.
Always in Threes<tab>Play Triple Triad 10 times.
A Winner Is You<tab>Win 10 Triple Triad matches.
Come Play Lord II<tab>Play Lord of Verminion 3 times.
Up for a Challenge V<tab>Complete 30 unique challenges.
Cards in the Hall<tab>Play 5 Triple Triad matches in the Battlehall.
Triple Tumble<tab>Win 3 Triple Triad matches in the Battlehall.
The Customer Is Always Right<tab>Complete 6 custom deliveries.
Spear Me<tab>Spear 50 fish.
Spear No Effort<tab>Spear 20 large-sized fish.
Prepare to Dice<tab>Participate in 10 Rival Wings campaigns.
Luck Be a Lady Tonight<tab>Lead your alliance to victory in 5 Rival Wings campaigns.
Forbidden Ice, Forbidden Lightning I<tab>Defeat 30 ice- or lightning-aspected enemies no more than two elemental levels below your own.
Forbidden Ice, Forbidden Lightning II<tab>Defeat 60 ice- or lightning-aspected enemies no more than two elemental levels below your own.
Forbidden Fire, Forbidden Earth I<tab>Defeat 30 fire- or earth-aspected enemies no more than two elemental levels below your own.
Forbidden Fire, Forbidden Earth II<tab>Defeat 60 fire- or earth-aspected enemies no more than two elemental levels below your own.
Forbidden Water, Forbidden Wind I<tab>Defeat 30 water- or wind-aspected enemies no more than two elemental levels below your own.
Forbidden Water, Forbidden Wind II<tab>Defeat 60 water- or wind-aspected enemies no more than two elemental levels below your own.
Forbidden Bone, Forbidden Ash I<tab>Defeat 20 ashkin in Eureka with an elemental level equal to or higher than your own.
Forbidden Bone, Forbidden Ash II<tab>Defeat 40 ashkin in Eureka with an elemental level equal to or higher than your own.
Forbidden Elements I<tab>Defeat 10 sprites in Eureka with an elemental level equal to or higher than your own.
Forbidden Elements II<tab>Defeat 20 sprites in Eureka with an elemental level equal to or higher than your own.
Come Play Lord I<tab>Play Lord of Verminion 1 time.
Come Play Lord III<tab>Play Lord of Verminion 5 times.
Master and Commander<tab>Successfully complete 3 command missions.
Kiwami<tab>Participate in 2 Doman Mahjong player matches.
In Your FATE I<tab>Complete 5 FATEs with the highest rating possible.
In Your FATE II<tab>Complete 10 FATEs with the highest rating possible.
My Big Break<tab>Successfully desynthesize 5 items.<nl>※Experience points may only be earned by crafting classes.
Come on in, It's Open<tab>Participate in an Open tournament and receive your reward.
Living off the Land<tab>Collect 100 materials in your island sanctuary.
Making a Living off the Land<tab>Ship 20 isleworks handicrafts.
